title: Propper Short Sleeve Security Uniform Polo Shirt
description: Stand out in Proppers NEW Security Uniform Polo. This budget-friendly, high-quality polo is a customer favorite and a great option for bike patrol, event staff, stadium security and campus safety. High-contrast "Security" is screen-printed on the left chest and across the back of our black Mens Uniform Polo. The Propper Security Uniform Polo has a classic fit with a professional appearance and is available in sizes up to 5XL.
